issue.title: front panel settings not loaded correctly if blacs is not run as a module

content.raw: I am not able to reproduce unfortunately, which makes debugging this a bit hard. The likely culprit is recent changes to properties.py in labscript_utils, which is now returning glorious unicode strings for everything, or possibly the inverted digital outputs, since that has to do with digital outputs , but I'm at a loss as to why it would depend on what directory you are running from.
content.html: I am not able to reproduce unfortunately, which makes debugging this a bit hard. The likely culprit is recent changes to properties.py in labscript_utils, which is now returning glorious unicode strings for everything, or possibly the inverted digital outputs, since that has to do with digital outputs , but I'm at a loss as to why it would depend on what directory you are running from.
